about_the_game:
Incredible arts specially designed to convey the joy of our kittens with Halloween!

Let the desktop of your computer with a unique look!

There are 6 images with 3840 x 2160 pixels and Ultra Wide (2560 x 1080 pixels).

After downloading this add-on will be available in the directory where the game “Hidden Shapes Trick or Cats” is installed, by default, it is (...\Steam\steamapps\common\ Hidden Shapes Trick or Cats \ Hidden Shapes Trick or Cats - Wallpapers).
